description: Gussys serves great tasting and very healthy Greek food. We are very excited to give the triangle a taste of Greece. A.K.A The Greek Devil from Duke University.Gus lives in Cary, NC with his wife and 4 children.New York born Gus Megaloudis is 'Gussy', known to Duke students as 'The Greek Devil'. While living in Greece for 17 years playing professional soccer, Gus grew to love Greek food.  Since 2009, Gus has been running 'The Greek Devil' on Duke's campus.  He and his staff serve Greek yogurt with toppings, hummus, cold sandwich wraps and other eat-on-the-go dishes. Now he is finally joining the Food Truck Revolution.  His dream of owning a food truck became a reality in July 2012.  He loves bringing the authentic flavors of the Mediterranean to the Triangle.
name: Greek Gussys
